column4: BRIEF-On March 20, White Mountains Insurance Group' Unit and NSM Insurance Group Entered Into Agreement To Acquire Kingsbridge Group Limited
column5: March 23 (Reuters) - White Mountains Insurance Group Ltd :
column6: * WHITE MOUNTAINS INSURANCE GROUP LTD - ON MARCH 20, NSM INSURANCE GROUP, LLC, CO’S UNIT, ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE KINGSBRIDGE GROUP LIMITED
column7: * WHITE MOUNTAINS INSURANCE GROUP LTD - DEAL, WHICH IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN Q2 OF 2020, VALUES KINGSBRIDGE AT APPROXIMATELY £120 MILLION
